title: 30: No Such Thing As A Song In The Sound Of Music
content: In their first ever live podcast recording, Dan (@schreiberland), James (@jamesharkin), Andy (@andrewhunterm) and Anna (@nosuchthing) discuss cow-based computer code, who won the Bone Wars and how northern accents beat the Nazis.
contentSnippet: In their first ever live podcast recording, Dan (@schreiberland), James (@jamesharkin), Andy (@andrewhunterm) and Anna (@nosuchthing) discuss cow-based computer code, who won the Bone Wars and how northern accents beat the Nazis.
